Params: {3: 'The campus is adorned with welcome projections, while the school anthem drifts through the air above the auditorium.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Student A', 3: 'Hey, hello there! Is this your first day at F.O.S.?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Student A', 3: "Here's the enrollment form. Make sure to fill it out using your terminal!", 4: '1'}
{3: 'The girl with purple eyes impatiently takes the form and turns to leave.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Student A', 3: "Oh... Hello there! You're also a freshman, right?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Student A', 3: "Hahaha, looks like we've got quite a few interesting freshmen this year. You're already wearing our uniform...", 4: '1'}
{3: 'The amiable senior student smiles and takes out an identical form.'}
{2: 'Student A', 3: "Here's the enrollment form. Make sure to fill it out using your terminal!", 4: '1'}
{3: 'After briefly pointing out a few things to note on the form, the senior student walks away.'}
{3: 'For some reason, everything before your eyes becomes blurry.'}

{3: 'The surrounding laughter and bustling chatter slowly dissipate. In a daze, the campus scenery somehow overlaps with an unfamiliar structure where white fog fills the air and crimson crystals resonate with a distinct, metallic sound...'}
{3: 'You rub your eyes. Perhaps due to excitement keeping you from sleeping well last night, your eyes feel a bit strained, but it should be nothing serious.'}
{3: 'You blink, and for a moment the surroundings seem to waver, but upon closer inspection, nothing appears out of the ordinary.'}
{2: 'I must be too nervous...', 3: '40', 4: 'I must be too excited...', 5: '40'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Student A', 3: 'Hello, do you need any help? I just noticed you seemed a bit out of it...', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Receiving your reassuring response, the senior student moves on to another freshman who appears to need help.'}
{2: '(Go back to check the enrollment form)', 3: '46'}
{3: 'Strange, why is an unknown title appearing in your mind?'}
{3: 'You shake your head and continue filling out the form on your terminal.'}
{3: 'Student ID... You think it was noted on the folder of your examination report. Where did you put that folder again...'}
{3: 'The corner of a worn folder peeks out from your backpack.'}

{3: 'The girl rushing to submit her enrollment form accidentally bumps into your shoulder. You lose grip of the folder, and the report pages are scattered across the ground by a mysterious gust of wind—'}
{3: 'In the upper right corner of the report, a handwritten code catches your attention—'}
{3: 'Why... would there be a handwritten code...'}
{3: 'The deliberately stretched "9" drags behind it a long trail like some kind of scar, as everything fades back into silence.'}
{3: 'A roar of thunder blasts in the air.'}
{3: 'In the pitch-black, damp environment, a steady heartbeat pulses in your ears...'}
{3: 'Memories resurface in a dizzying carousel, as Chaos seems to undergo an excruciating process of being shattered and reconstructed.'}
{3: 'Your gaze clings to her consciousness as fleeing footsteps gradually quicken...'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: "Hello, my name is Lucia. My frame designation is BPL-01, Lotus, and I'm also the team leader of Gray Raven—"}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: 'I look forward to working with you!'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: 'My name is Lee, frame designation BPN-06, Palefire.'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: 'My original team... is not important. I have been assigned to Gray Raven. Dual guns are my weapons of choice.'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: 'I am equally adept at strategic planning and close combat.'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: 'My turn... um, my name is Liv, Support Construct.'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: 'I came from Egret... my preferred weapons are levitated weapons platforms. I look forward to working together.'}
{3: "At times it's memories belonging to Gray Raven, at others it's..."}
{1: '1', 2: 'Shorthalt', 3: "You're going to the Youth Center again next month? You've been on quite a few missions lately—maybe you should take some proper rest?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Shorthalt', 3: 'After all these years... that child must be all grown up by now.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Shorthalt', 3: "Project Cthylla? What's so important about a crazy project that was terminated long ago?", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Shorthalt', 3: "The small purple Ascendant didn't off me, just chopped me up and dumped me in a heap of rubble.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Noan', 3: 'My dream, that future we wanted, is right there beyond the seemingly infinite darkness.'}
{2: 'Noan', 3: 'Hope will triumph and fulfill its dream!'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Noan?', 3: 'You remember the name "Noan", but not this incident?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Noan?', 3: 'There\'s another "real me" in Babylonia, right? Gray Raven Commandant?', 4: '1'}
{3: 'The fragmented illusions are endlessly shattered and reconstructed, as chaotic memories continuously appear and vanish within the "egg".'}
{3: 'The pain, mercifully enveloped, hatches once more.'}
{3: 'This "story" has quietly changed the ending of fate.'}
{2: 'Ishmael', 3: "It's been so long... since I've done something this adventurous.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'The simple delight of pulling off this clever deception briefly fills her consciousness, creating a ripple in her long, monotonous life.'}
{3: 'The book pages open gently, turning to the page marked with a giant whale.'}
{3: 'Her index finger glides across the book, where crimson-gold threads twist and writhe.'}
{3: "Vonnegut never makes just one plan. On the book's projection, a gradually sprouting sapling is deeply rooted in the Red Tide."}
{3: 'The shrewd agent, like a cunning rabbit with multiple burrows, has already set up a new Tree of Life in another area.'}
{3: 'The small Tree of Life emits an eerie red glow in the dim base, a crimson egg slowly pulsating within its embrace.'}
{3: 'He hasn\'t noticed that the "consciousness" within has already been replaced, and the gaze of "Gray Raven" is now attached to the yet-to-hatch "Chaos".'}
{3: "The undersea cradle is thrown into chaos as a giant whale leaps from the water's surface."}
{3: 'With great interest and a hint of anticipation, she turns her gaze back to the book.'}
{2: 'Ishmael', 3: 'Can you really find the key to breaking this closed loop...', 4: '1'}
{3: 'The crimson egg once again pulsates with the rhythm of life.'}
{3: 'The ending of the story has already been changed; the parade beneath the sea is never meant solely for the abandoned.'}
{1: '"We" will continue to search for our path even in death—', 3: '55', 4: 'ffffffff'}
{3: '"We" will continue to search for our path even in death—'}
{3: 'But what "we" truly desire is to endure life and see tomorrow.'}
{3: 'At the end of "death" lies the tomorrow of "hope".'}
{3: 'The torch will inevitably be rekindled, and the Gray Raven emblem will once again shine beneath the brilliant sunlight.'}
